name: misspelling
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of spelling a word wrongly, or an example of this: This essay is full of misspellings. The computer system didn't tolerate the smallest misspellings. See
misspell
More examplesFewer examplesThere were several spectacular misspellings in the map.I've never seen so much misspelling in a single webpage.English is not my first language, so sorry for any mistakes or misspellings.
